Introduction.paragraph1: I'm Jim, a self-motivated student developer with the actual experience of over three years collaborating and working on multiple web-based projects of different domains, mostly integrating GIS techniques into the system, and providing a solution to the clients.
Introduction.paragraph2: Passionate, hardworking programmer with experience in frontend frameworks such as React.js with Typescript and Tailwindcss, and Nest.js for developing backend services.
